summary: A well-known crime boss is murdered by a sniper in front of his family.
cast: Peter Haber|Mikael Persbrandt|Ingvar Hirdwall|Rebecka Hemse|Måns Nathanaelson|Anna Asp|Elmira Arikan|Jonas Karlsson|Åsa Karlin|Anu Sinisalo|Sofia Zouagui|Marie Robertson|Freddie Mosten-Jacob|Kassel Ulving|Björn Andersson|Philip Martin|Vuksan Rovcanin|Antti Reini|Johannes Brost|Daniel Sjöberg|Leif Ahrle|Duncan Green|Jessica Forsberg|Tommy Wättring|Mårten Andersson|Cedomir Djordjevic|Ari Toivonen|Henrik Johansson|Richard Forsgren|Mahmut Suvakci|Sovi Rydén|Johan Berg|Feli Cabrera|Alexi Carpentieri
title: Familjen
